story_teamaquamagma_01_11000/2401_1001_0: We haven’t heard anything so far, have we?
They must be struggling to find Groudon.

That does seem to be the case. But all we can do
now is wait for them.
Stand by until they contact us.

You seem to have some downtime. Could we chat
for a bit?

I’ve heard rumors that you and Archie, the leader
of Team Aqua, used to be in the same
organization. Is that true?

I see you’ve done your research. I suppose you
would have, being part of the International Police.

If you once had the same goals in the past,
why are you always fighting? Can’t you work
through those differences?
story_teamaquamagma_01_11000/2401_1001_1:
There is justice in fighting an old friend if it is to
pursue your own ideologies.

I imagine Archie feels just as strongly about that
as I do.
And I know his feelings are real.
That is why I can’t go easy on him.
Your feud with him sounds complicated...
To fight for your own ideologies...
